title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is inred text.
OB: When choosing the project name to be 'test', a static text validation error appears on the 'Copy Project' dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Clean F2 and create a single project named 'test'.
2. Copy the project.
3. Paste the project.
4. On the 'Copy Project' dialog:
    a. With the 'Use Default Location' checkbox checked, you should still be able to select to view or copy the default location from the edit box below.
    b. It should be possible to choose a path close to the default location.
